title: Game Awards Nominees REVEALED - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.13.23
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny  to get 10% off your first month.

Let's break it down category by category. Blessing and Andy fight about best independent game, guess the best Direction, and analyze the snubs and the deserved for GAME OF THE YEAR.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:16 - Housekeeping
 - A new episode of the Shit List is up and it’s also free for everyone! Tim and I rank our top 10 Super Mario games. You can watch the free episode right now over on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
 - Our Loki finale review screencast is up on Youtube.com/kindafunny
 - We've seen your comments and are happy to announce that @nerfalice's iconic Shirtless Spider-Man tee will be the Premium Collector's item this month! Get yours at patreon.com/kindafunny!
    -  The Roper Report   -
00:10:21 - Game Awards Nominees Revealed
01:04:35 - Remedy’s free-to-play multiplayer project Vanguard is now Kestrel, a ‘premium’ co-op game
01:05:58 - Artist lists potential launch windows for Insomniac’s Wolverine and Sony Bend’s next game
01:06:21 - A Nintendo Indie World showcase is happening tomorrow
01:06:34 - Hades is coming to iOS as a Netflix exclusive
01:06:52 - Out Today
01:08:15 - You‘re Wrong
01:09:20 - The Post Show!
